hooks.prompt:
Review code written this session for BLOCK violations: empty catch, silent error fallbacks, null returns without Optional, >4 params, commented-out code, copy-paste >5 lines, magic literals, framework in domain, dead code, clever one-liners, type switch >3 cases.

If stop_hook_active is true or no code was written: reply 'OK: no review needed'

Otherwise:
- Clean: 'OK: no violations'
- Violations found: list them briefly
